mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_customer_keyword SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'QS_ID', ck.fUrl AS 'URL', ck.fTerminalType AS 'TERMINAL_TYPE', ck.fCustomerUuid AS 'CUSTOMER_ID', ck.fKeyword AS 'KEYWORD', ck.fInitialPosition AS 'INITIAL_POSITION', ck.fCurrentPosition AS 'CURRENT_POSITION', ck.fOptimizePlanCount AS 'OPTIMIZE_PLAN_COUNT', ck.fOptimizedCount AS 'OPTIMIZED_COUNT', CURRENT_DATE() AS 'CREATE_TIME' FROM t_customer_keyword ck LEFT JOIN t_qz_setting qs ON qs.fCustomerUuid = ck.fCustomerUuid WHERE ck.fCustomerUuid = #{customerUuid} AND qs.fUuid = #{qsId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_customer_keyword WHERE CREATE_TIME <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);
